__e: I swear to you on all that I hold dear - on my life, on my religion, on God, on all the saints and angels in heaven... I did not kick you up the arse.
when I go there I don 't think it 's right that I adore some of the Saints but don 't say anything to the others
There shall be holy children and indeed, there have been children who bore so great a love of God that it exceeded all things.
